name: Witch's Cauldron
text: (Quick Effect): You can return this card to your hand; Special Summon 1 "Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods" from your hand, Deck, or GY in face-up Attack Position. If a "Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods" leaves the field because of an opponentâ€™s card effect: You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 "House" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) You can only activate each effect of "Witch's Cauldron" once per turn.
